name: bot-mox-project
description: Bot-Mox Project - Bot Farm Management System

scripts.deploy:local:restart: pnpm run stack:prod-sim:down && pnpm run stack:prod-sim:up
scripts.dev:prodlike:restart: pnpm run stack:dev:down && pnpm run stack:dev:up
scripts.audit:antd6:gate:full: pnpm run audit:antd6:gate && pnpm run audit:antd6:scan -- --strict && pnpm run audit:antd6:e2e
scripts.biome:check:mono: pnpm exec biome check apps packages configs scripts start-dev.js agent/src bot-mox/src proxy-server/src
scripts.biome:write:mono: pnpm exec biome check apps packages configs scripts start-dev.js agent/src bot-mox/src proxy-server/src --write
scripts.check:all:mono: pnpm turbo run check db:types:check contract:check && pnpm run biome:check:mono && pnpm run check:no-any:mono && pnpm run check:pnpm:first && pnpm run check:legacy:contract-adapters && pnpm run check:zod:boundaries && pnpm run check:ui:boundaries && pnpm run check:entities:service-boundary && pnpm run check:vm:provider-boundary && pnpm run check:strangler:parity && pnpm run check:strangler:routing
